name: PersonalBridge
author: PersonalBridge

sections.description:
The PersonalBridge is a plugin for WooCommerce, this plugin allows you sell personalized print-on-demand products on WooComemrce. Your customer can change text, change clipart, upload custom photo and live preview before buying.

Ready-for-print: Your orders will be sent to PersonalBridge and PersonalBridge automatically create ready-for-print print files for your orders, you only need to download file PNG with 300 DPI.

Fulfillment services integrations: import product catalogs from your favorite fulfillment services and create personalized campaigns using PersonalBridge. Your orders are fulfilled and shipped by your favorite services such as Customcat, Gearment, Dreamship, Scalable Press, Merchize… We also provide custom order CSV with ready-to-print files for other fulfillments such as Printify, Printful ….

Visit our: Official website

Privacy Policies: Privacy policies

Terms & Conditions: Terms & conditions

View our tutorial videos

Note: This plugin does not support with website on localhost

Power features

  • Upload cliparts from folder
  • Create mockup from PSD
  • Artwork Templates from PSD
  • Auto fulfill with fulfillment services
  • Create your own product catalog
  • Unlimited customizations
  • Conditional Logic
  • Live Preview
sections.installation:
1. Upload personalbridge to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Create an account on https://dashboard.personalbridge.com/ and complete install.
sections.faq:
Is it compatible with any kinds of WooCommerce Theme?

Yes, it’s compatible with any WooCommerce theme including Flatsome / OceanWP / Astra / Storefront… But sometimes it may require small css tweak.

Where can I find documentation and user guides?

View document online https://support.personalbridge.com

short_description: A plugin for WooCommerce with PersonalBridge help design, sell, and print personal products faster.
